attributes.action: Extend all weekends to the length of a three-day Bank Holiday weekend with Mondays off as well as Saturdays and Sundays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Motivation among workers of all ages and productivity increased if weekends were three days rather than two days long. Also, everyone would be happier and get more time to enjoy quality time with their families, with a resultant bost to the economy and general standard of living of the country as people became happier and worked harder on the four days of work they work on.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
